name: Remote Rescue
description:
Help! Our little TV friend has seemed to lost his most favorite remote. Travel through  the spooky cave to  aid in the rescue. You may just find the outdated electronic behind the heist.  Along the way, see if you can collect all 26 batteries! You'll need  all the power you can get!

CONTROLS:

W - Up/Enter Door

A - Left

S - Down

D - Right

SPACE - Shoot
